install.name: Community Builder Admin menu
install.author: Beat & Kyle
install.description: [Version 1.6] Module displaying links for Community Builder (CB) and, if installed for Community Builder Paid Subscriptions plugin (CBSubs) and CB GroupJive. Please see the modules parameters for configuration. To access the module, go now to Extensions -> Modules -> and click the "Administrator modules" link in the Module Manager. The module will be listed as "Community Builder Admin menu".

param.name: @spacer
param.default:
• To setup and display the module within the menu.
    1. Set Display Mode to Drop-Down Menu (drop-down parameter field below).
    2. Set Position to Menu (drop-down parameter field on left).
    3. Set Enabled as Yes (radio parameter field on left).
    4. Set the Order (drop-down parameter field on left) to be after Admin Menu.
    5. Click save.
  • To setup and display the module within the control panel.
    1. Set Display Mode to Table (drop-down parameter field below).
    2. Set Position to cPanel (drop-down parameter field on left).
    3. Set Enabled as Yes (radio parameter field on left).
    4. Click save.
Note: You can create 2 instances of this module to get both cpanel and menu effects by selecting and copying the module within Modules Manager List.

param.name: cb_adminnav_cb
param.label: CB Menu
param.description: Show or hide display of Community Builder menu.

param.name: cb_adminnav_cbsubs
param.label: CBSubs Menu
param.description: Show or hide display of Community Builder Subscriptions plugin menu.

param.name: cb_adminnav_cbgj
param.label: GroupJive Menu
param.description: Show or hide display of Community Builder GroupJive plugin menu.

param.name: cb_adminnav_plugins
param.label: Plugin Menus
param.description: Show or hide display of plugin menus. Please note this will load all published Community Builder plugins to the backend. Plugins with Fatal errors could cause negative affects!
